environmentModal.title: Environment Variables Required
environmentModal.description: GitHub authentication requires specific environment variables to be configured. The following variables are missing or empty:
environmentModal.step1: Create a .env file in your project root if it doesn't exist
environmentModal.step2: Add the missing environment variables with your GitHub OAuth app credentials
environmentModal.step4: Try logging in with GitHub again
environmentModal.documentation: Check the documentation for setup instructions

demoMode.title: Demo Mode
demoMode.description: This demo is connected to the Start UI Web demo environment. Social login is disabled for security reasons.
demoMode.enableGithub: To enable GitHub login, you have two options:
demoMode.option1Step1: 1. Deploy your own Start UI Web instance
demoMode.option1Step2: 2. Configure your GitHub Client ID and Secret
demoMode.option2Step2: 2. Configure your GitHub Client ID and Secret
demoMode.option2Step3: 3. Connect using your IP address instead of localhost
